net.wekeypedia.elements

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.wekeypedia.elements.Query

  • public class Query
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to query the api at the address https://[domain].wikipedia.org/w/api.php
    Author:
    jeremie

     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)

        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • hasContinue

        public boolean hasContinue()
        Return whether the last query performed can be continued.
        Returns:
        true if the last query can be continued; false otherwise.

      • fetch

        public com.mongodb.DBObject fetch()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Perform the query and return the result of the query.
        Returns:
        The result from the query encoded in a DBObject.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem append when reading the result of the query.

      • continueFetch

        public com.mongodb.DBObject continueFetch()
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Try to continue the last query and return the result.
        Returns:
        The result from the query encoded in a DBObject; null if the last query cannot be continued
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem append when reading the result of the query.
